Title: The War Within
Description:
There is a vision being seen across Azeroth. A "Radiant Song." We believe it's a warning, but we are unsure of its meaning.

Meet me in Silithus. We must ask Azeroth's Speaker what this vision means.
ObjectivesText: Go to Silithus to talk with Thrall about the visions spreading across Azeroth.
RewardText: We're all here. Good. Let's find out what the Radiant Song is trying to tell us.

Objectives.Text: Use the teleportation scroll to teleport to Silithus
